sortFiles

public java.io.File[] sortFiles(java.io.File[] files)
Sorts the array of files based upon the specified sort order. Defaults to directory. Most of this method ripped from Cocoon's DirectoryGenerator class, the justification for this being that it seems the only logical way of coding the method!!

Parameters:
files - The array of files to sort
